summary: Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Gang visit Oakhaven, Massachusetts to seek strange goings on involving a famous horror novelist and his ancestor who is rumored be a witch.
cast: Scott Innes|Mary Kay Bergman|Frank Welker|B.J. Ward|Tim Curry|Kimberly Brooks|Jennifer Hale|Jane Wiedlin|Bob Joles|Tress MacNeille|Peter Renaday|Neil Ross|Jamie Alcroft|Debi Derryberry|Buster Jones
keywords: horror for children|1990s|all girl band|turkey|animal character name in title
title: Scooby-Doo and the Witch's Ghost
